description: This table extracts the related multiple-response Compound Ingredient Modifier Code (I RXA 3820) item.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated "Compound Product ID" in the adjudication's record. Together with adjudication RECORD_ID, this forms the foreign key to the RXA_COMP_ING_MOD_C table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple "Compound Product ID" codes associated with the adjudication from the RXA_COMP_ING_MOD_C table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: O_CMPND_INGR_MOD_ID
columns.description: Identifies special circumstances related to the dispensing/payment of the product as identified in the Compound Product ID (489-TE).

columns.name: O_CMPND_INGR_MOD_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
